rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 12 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:35 AM, 29 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Batangas, Bulacan and Pampanga within the next 3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Las Pinas, Muntinlupa), Cavite(Bacoor), Laguna(San Pedro, Binan), Rizal(Taytay), Zambales(Masinloc, Candelaria), Bataan(Limay, Mariveles) and Quezon(Tagkawayan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
